description: This table stores the answers for a questionnaire series.

columns.name: SERIES_ANS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the series answer record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the contact number of the series answer record.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: FORM_ID
columns.description: This column stores the ID of an individual questionnaire in a questionnaire series record.

columns.name: FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: QUESTIONNAIRE_CSN
columns.description: This column stores the questionnaire's contact date (DAT) in a series of questionnaires.

columns.name: QUESR_INST_NUM
columns.description: To store the bucket number of an answer to a specific questionnaire.

columns.name: QUESR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
To store the status of a particular questionnaire (in-progress, disabled, expired, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Assigned - Pre-Anchor Event


Assigned - Post-Anchor Event


In Progress - Pre-Anchor Event


In Progress - Post-Anchor Event


Completed - Pre-Anchor Event


Completed - Post-Anchor Event


Disabled - Pre-Anchor Event


Disabled - Post-Anchor Event


Disabled - Anchor Event Filed

columns.name: STATUS_CHANGE_DTTM
columns.description: To store the change instant of a status of a questionnaire.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of entry when a record is edited

columns.name: QUESR_ANS_ENC_CSN
columns.description: This column stores the contact date (DAT) of the encounter for which questionnaire answers are saved. Note that there will be a contact date only if a message is being routed or if the questionnaire is part of an appointment.

columns.name: QUESR_ANS_WPR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the patient web portal ID of the user who answered the questionnaire.

columns.name: QUESR_DUE_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the due date of an individual questionnaire for this series answer record.
